overview: Provide the URL that lets you access your Black Duck server.
Choose the Username and Password from the list to authenticate to the Black Duck server.
Alternatively, choose the Api Token from the list to authenticate to the Black Duck server.
If the credentials you are looking for are not in the list then you can add them with the Add button.
If selected, Detect will automatically trust certificates when communicating with your Black Duck server.
Provide the URL that lets you access your Polaris server.
Choose the Access Token from the list to authenticate to the Polaris server.
If the credentials you are looking for are not in the list then you can add them with the Add button.
If selected, Detect will automatically trust certificates when communicating with your Polaris server.
